email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

We are pleased to offer the vessel SEA HORIZON for your 12,000MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms.

Rate: USD 42 per MT.
Laycan: 15-20 October.
Vessel details: DWT 75,000, LOA 225m.
Demurrage: USD 10,000 per day.

Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the offer. The rate of USD 42 per MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Can you revise the rate to USD 38 per MT?

Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for your response. Given the current market, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40 per MT. This is our best offer at this time.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 40 per MT is acceptable. Can you confirm the laycan and demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. Demurrage rate remains at USD 10,000 per day. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We accept the terms. Please proceed with the booking and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for your confirmation. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let us know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
John
